channel.title: [PI] [317] Virtual Energy 24/7
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i56.tinypic.com/1zx7f4y.jpg[/img]
Hi, I'm Noname. This is my server. I've been working on it a lot and I'm currently trying to gather a development team.
Please don't flame...
! Staff Requirement's ! [code]1. Be active and online at least an hour per day 2. Don't abuse powers 3. Be active on forums 4. Respectful to players 5. As a staff member you have each staff members trust, don't take advantage of that. 6. Professionalism is a must. 7. Grammar 8. MSN (REQUIRED! NO EXCEPTION!) 9. Activity on Forums. 10. Chatbox Activity.[/code]
------------------------------------------------------------
::: :::Positions available::: ::: ---------------Coder - 1/1--------------- ---------------Owner - 1/1--------------- ---------------Co-owner - 1/1--------------- ---------------Head Admin's - 1/1--------------- ---------------Admin's - 1/2--------------- ---------------Head Mod - 1/1--------------- ---------------Mod's - 0/2--------------- ---------------GFX Designer - 1/1--------------- ---------------More ranks to come soon...---------------
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]How to apply![/b]
Add hail_headshot@live.com on MSN and talk to him there or post an application [u]with the correct format here[/u]
[code]IRL Name (Optional): Age: Maturity (Rate how mature you think you are.) (1-6): Country: State (If U.S): Timezone (Optional if you provide U.S state you live in.):
IGN (Current IGN or future IGN): What position are you applying for?: Why do you think you deserve this position?: What experience do you have with this position?: MSN: Have you read all the rules?: Do you agree to follow all of them?:[/code]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Details\Info:
---------------------- - Added Primal and all the other dungeoneering gear. - Custom Dungeoneering dungeon's + custom shops - A nice ::stafflist, ::home, and a couple of other commands. - Hand Cannon - Full morrigan javelins and throwing axes - Full Skill cape emotes! - Real turmoil! - New 602 animation and gfx’s - Correct spirit shield bonuses and EFFECTS! - Crystal Key chest have the chance to get 3rd age and rares - New overloads potions - New extreme potions - Full working chaotic weapons - Full Godwars - Full functioning Clan Chat - Full weapon specials and emotes - Constant Updates - All Spirit Shields - Full Pvp weapons - Shops - Great training - Open Staff Slots - Running on 24/7 [b][i][u][size=12pt]NO LAG[/size][/u][/i][/b] VPS - Great skilling for non-pkers - Fight pits - Full dueling with staking
******************* Media:
[img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/1eqe.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/2zuz.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/3fvf.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/4nvn.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/5ele.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/6dtd.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/7aua.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/8ywy.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/9hdh.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/10rzr.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/11xux.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/12dfd.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/13yyy.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/14nln.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/15znz.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/16rgr.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/17ypy.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/18kxk.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/19xxx.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/20wow.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/21qdq.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/22pnp.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/23.png[/img] [img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/24zoz.png[/img]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hope you enjoyed :) [b][size=12pt](This server is a new server and is just starting out, I'd say the server is around 40% Complete.)[/size][/b] ----------------------------------------------------------------------- Owner MSN - hail_headshot@live.com
Sincerly,
Noname

item.title: [PI] [317] Virtual Energy 24/7
item.dc:creator: @owner5 owner5
item.description:
@owner5 wrote:

IRL Name (Optional): Omar
Age: 17
Maturity (Rate how mature you think you are.) (1-6):6
Country: United States
State (If U.S): New Jersey
Timezone (Optional if you provide U.S state you live in.): Eastern Time Zone

IGN (Current IGN or future IGN): i think that means in game name? lol if it does then it would be: Deadly

What position are you applying for?: Moderator or Admin

Why do you think you deserve this position?: well i was a co owner for server called Deadlyscape back in 08 and i kept the position for about 3 years until the server was shut down. I took a couple of months off from Runescape servers. Anyway all i want to do is become a help for this server, i want become part of what looks like an incredible project and i believe it will become big. I want to be part of this process and i want to help out the community in any way. Because when i help out as much as i can, i know players will continue to play, because of a great staff (which i promise i will be). Im not in it for the power, to be honest a moderators aren’t respected in many servers. That’s because they abuse their power. Im not an idiot and i dont plan on doing that. So i hope you get a chance to see this and understand that i am free and im ready to give this project all i got.

What experience do you have with this position?: As i previously mentioned, i was a co-owner for 3 years on Deadlyscape

MSN: Jumaji3@hotmail.com

Have you read all the rules?: Yes i have…

Do you agree to follow all of them?: ofcourse

Read full topic
